get.description: Lists the SaaSHub Saas resource under the tenant.
Gets a SaaSHub Saas resource by its ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

AutoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a SaaSHub saas resource. The default value will be 'On' for products that support autorenew.

values.name: Once
values.description: Auto renew is turned on for the next term only

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

cancellationWindowEndTimestamp.description: The end date in UTC time by when the self-serve cancellation ends.

CanCreateCloudServiceRequest.description: Request to check if the cloud service can be created

name.description: Resource name of the saas hub resource to be created.

type.description: Resource type to be created, currently only supports CloudService resource type.

properties.description: The properties of the saas hub resource to be created.

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

CanCreateResultAddOnInfo.description: Additional detail when request payload failed addOn constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

addOn.description: Additional detail when request payload failed addOn constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

promotion.description: Additional detail when request payload failed promotion constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

futurePrice.description: Additional evaluation eligibility result for qualifying co-term resources for a future price concession. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

coTermDates.description: Additional detail when request payload failed coTerm constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

CanCreateResultFuturePriceInfo.description: Model to present additional info about future price eligibility

termEndDate.description: The term end date in UTC time, for resources in this group.

totalQuantity.description: Total cumulative quantity of licenses for resources in this group.

isEligible.description: Whether the future price concession eligibility is satisfied by subscriptions in this group

qualifyingResources.description: List of qualifying resources for the future price concession

futurePriceConcessionTypes.description: Types of future price concession. E.g. FuturePriceNotToExceedCap, PercentageDiscount

minimumQuantityRequired.description: Minimum number of seats required to be eligible for the future price concession

CanCreateResultFuturePriceQualifyingReso.description: Model to represent the future price qualified resource

CanCreateResultPromotionInfo.description: Model to present promotion eligibility info.

isEligible.description: True if user is eligible for this promotion, false otherwise

CanCreateSaasResourceRequest.description: Request to check if the saas resource can be created

name.description: Resource name of the saas hub resource to be created.

type.description: Resource type to be created, currently only supports SaaS resource type.

properties.description: The properties of the saas hub resource to be created.

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

updateScenario.description: Update scenario that was identified based on the canUpdate request body values.

refundableQuantity.description: Additional detail when request payload failed refundableQuantity constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable. Relevant scenarios: remove quantity.

coTermDates.description: Additional detail when request payload failed coTerm constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable. Relevant scenarios: coterm, scheduled conversion with coterm.

Cancellation.description: The policy override for the resource indicates whether the self-serve cancellation or seat reduction is allowed.

properties.description: The properties of a SaaSHub cloud service.

CloudServiceCanMergeResult.description: Validation result for canMerge operation on cloud service.

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

CloudServiceListResult.description: The response of a CloudService list operation.

value.description: The CloudService items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

CloudServiceProperties.description: The properties of a SaaSHub cloud service.

autoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a seat-based resource. The default value will be 'On' for products that support autorenew.

endCustomerBillingAccount.description: The end customer billing account in CSP scenario, will full format like /providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/1111:2222

displayName.description: The name of the seat-based resource.

productType.description: Type of the product for which the resource is purchased

offerType.description: Type of the offer for which the resource is purchased

productCode.description: Product Universal Product Number of the product

provisioningState.description: Gets the status of the seat-based resource at the time the operation was called.

quantity.description: The number of licenses purchased for the resource

skuDescription.description: The SKU description of the product for which the resource is purchased.

status.description: The status of the seat-based resource.

suspensionReasons.description: The suspension reason for a resource.

provisioningTenantId.description: The Id of the tenant where licenses will be provisioned for this resource. It will only be populated if licenses are provisioned in a different tenant.

externalId.description: An external Id which could be used to reference other commerce system entity, such as OMS sub id or proposal id. ExternalId value will have "{externalSystem}:{externalId}", e.g. "oms:1111-2222-444-666"

systemOverrides.description: System imposed policies that regulate behavior of the resource.

resourceTokens.description: Resource tokens for various authorization and context purposes.

scheduleActions.description: Schedule actions for future terms and changes

originalResourceUri.description: The original resource uri, if the new resource will be created by splitting part of the licenses from an existing resource

CloudServiceUpdate.description:
A SaaSHub cloud service update model for patch and canUpdate operations.

This model uses composition to include:
1. CloudServiceProperties (resource-specific properties)
2. TrackedResourceUpdateFields (updateable fields from TrackedResource)

This ensures both PATCH and canUpdate operations use identical request bodies
without requiring the 'location' field.

properties.description: The properties of a SaaSHub cloud service.

coTermTarget.description: Target cloud resource or contract name to coTerm to.

coTermTargetType.description: Whether the target is cloud resource or contract.

termEndDate.description: CoTerm end date in UTC time.

CoTermTargetType.description: Whether the target is cloud resource or contract.

CotermEndDateItem.description: End date information for coterm calculation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the end date entry.

termDuration.description: Term duration for this specific end date.

endDates.description: List of end dates to calculate coterm targets for.

startDate.description: Start date for the coterm calculation in UTC time.

termDuration.description:
Term duration for the coterm calculation.
An ISO 8601 duration using exactly one of the year, month or day designators. E.g. P1Y, P1M.

coTermTarget.description: Target cloud resource or contract name to coterm to.

coTermTargetType.description: Whether the target is cloud resource or contract.

termEndDate.description: Term end date in UTC time.

errorCode.description: Error code if coterm calculation failed.

isEligible.description: true if eligibility is satisfied, false otherwise

EligibilityResult.description: True if user is eligible for this promotion, false otherwise

GetRefundableQuantityInfo.description: Model to present detailed refundable quantity information with event details.

eventDateTime.description: The date and time when the event occurred that created this refundable quantity.

deltaQuantity.description: The change in quantity from this event.

returnWindowEndDateTime.description:
The end date and time in UTC when the refund window ends for this quantity.
Optional - may be null if there is no specific window limit.

refundableQuantities.description: List of refundable quantity information with event details.

totalRefundableQuantity.description: Total refundable quantity across all events.

LinkedResources.description: Linked resources for the saas resource

resourceIds.description: The resources ids which will be linked to current resource.

sourceResources.description: List of source resources to be merged into target resource.

sourceResources.description: List of source resources to be merged into target resource.

resourceTokens.description: Resource tokens for various authorization and context purposes (for merge target).

quantity.description: The quantity of license to be merged

validationError.description: The validation error it ran into. Null when validation passed.

resourceTokens.description: Resource tokens for various authorization and context purposes (for merge source).

quantity.description: The quantity of license to be merged

validationError.description: The validation error it ran into. Null when validation passed.

resourceTokens.description: Resource tokens for various authorization and context purposes (for merge source).

error.description: Error information if any issues occurred with this line item.

additionalInfo.description: Additional information for the line item.

errorCode.description: Error code for the line item.

message.description: Error message for the line item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the proposal response.

lineItems.description: List of line items in the proposal.

values.name: Processing

values.name: Updating

values.name: Unknown

refundableQuantities.description: Batches of refundable quantity with their respective refund window end date.

returnWindowEndDateTime.description: The end date in UTC time by when the refund window ends.

endCustomerBillingAccount.description: The end customer billing account in CSP scenario, will full format like /providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/1111:2222

productCode.description: Product Universal Product Number of the product

provisioningState.description: Gets the status of the seat-based resource at the time the operation was called.

quantity.description: The number of licenses purchased for the resource

skuDescription.description: The SKU description of the product for which the resource is purchased.

status.description: The status of the seat-based resource.

suspensionReasons.description: The suspension reason for a resource.

provisioningTenantId.description: The Id of the tenant where licenses will be provisioned for this resource. It will only be populated if licenses are provisioned in a different tenant.

externalId.description: An external Id which could be used to reference other commerce system entity, such as OMS sub id or proposal id. ExternalId value will have "{externalSystem}:{externalId}", e.g. "oms:1111-2222-444-666"

systemOverrides.description: System imposed policies that regulate behavior of the resource.

resourceTokens.description: Resource tokens for various authorization and context purposes.

scheduleActions.description: Schedule actions for future terms and changes

billingScope.description: The billing scope to use for purchasing the resource. Needs full billing scope to invoice section level like: providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{baId}/billingProfiles/{bfId}/invoiceSections/{isId}

billingSubscriptionId.description: The billing subscription id linked to this resource, with full format like /providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/1111:2222/billingSubscriptions/Id

originalResourceUri.description: The original resource uri, if the new resource will be created by splitting part of the licenses from an existing resource

effectiveDate.description: The effective date for the schedule action

productCode.description: Product code for the schedule action

quantity.description: The quantity for the schedule action

endDate.description: The end date for the schedule action

linkedResource.description:
Linked resource for the scheduled action.
Optional property.

offerType.description: Type of the offer for which the schedule action is applied

resourceTokens.description: Resource tokens for various authorization and context purposes.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the target resource for the scheduled action

billingScope.description:
The billing scope for the linked resource. Only applicable for SaaS resources.
Format: /providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{baId}/billingProfiles/{bfId}/invoiceSections/{isId}

resourceType.description: The resource type for the linked resource.

SeatBasedResourceStatus.description: The status of a seat-based resource.

SystemOverrides.description: System imposed policies that regulate behavior of the resource.

cancellation.description: The policy override for the resource indicates whether the self-serve cancellation or seat reduction is allowed.

cancellationAllowedEndDate.description: The end date in UTC time by when the self-serve cancellation ends.

systemId.description: Represents an dependency-generated ID unique per instance of this resource.

systemVersion.description: Represents a system entity version for the resource, used for concurrency control.

renewalCount.description: The number of times the resource has been renewed.

startDateOnCurrentProductCode.description: The start date in UTC time on the current product code.

licenseReassignmentDuration.description:
Duration of license reassignment period for the current term. Value is an ISO 8601 duration string.
Expected to be P0D (0 days) or greater.

dataRetentionDuration.description:
ISO 8601 duration string representing the data retention period for the resource.
Read-only property.

productUrl.description:
URL pointing to the product information in the Catalog endpoint.
Read-only property.

TermDetails.description: Term details of the saas resource.

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency of the product under the saas resource. Example P1Y and P1M

termUnit.description: The duration for which you can use the saas resource. Example P1Y and P1M

startDate.description: Start date of the term in UTC time. When there is a value passed in for PUT scenario, it is to support future start date scenario. The time part passed in will be ignored

endDate.description: End date of the term in UTC time. When there is a value passed in for PUT scenario, it is to support co-term scenario. When there is a value passed in for PATCH scenario, it is to support extend trial scenario. The time part passed in will be ignored
